summary:
Stage director and choreographer based in Amsterdam.

I direct and choreograph for dance companies, festivals, museums at site specific locations and for digital platforms. My work ranges from directing and giving shape to existing music for example Stabat Mater (Pergolesi), Johannes Passion(Bach) to creating original work from scratch. It is very often of an interdisciplinary nature, bringing diverse artists and perspectives to the projects and audiences who follow different disciplines together.
As a creative director of House of Makers, an interdisciplinary arts company, and my former role as Young Creative Associate at Dutch National Ballet, I have been working as a maker, a creative consultant and as an ambassador for the arts; I create, produce and facilitate artistic projects and build bridges between the business and creative sides of organisations.
